locations.name: Elderwood Village
locations.description: A peaceful village nestled in a mystical forest, surrounded by ancient oak trees that glow faintly at night.
locations.notable_features: The Whispering Glade (sacred clearing), Moonfall Inn, Crystal River with healing properties
locations.inhabitants: 500 villagers (mostly humans and halflings), some forest spirits
locations.dangers: Forest predators, occasional bandit raids, mischievous sprites
locations.climate: Temperate forest climate, mild winters, rainy springs
